leafs.name: Knowledge check 1
leafs.q: Question: Which of the following is not possible when a user is logged in as a standard user?
leafs.correct_option: Change the account password of another user

options.1: Change the background image on the desktop
options.2: Change the account password of another user
options.3: Change the account picture of own account
options.4: Play music from the hard disk

leafs.button_success: Watch video on creating a password
leafs.button_error: Watch video on creating a user account

leafs.name: Video 2
leafs.title: Creating a password for an account

leafs.name: Knowledge check 2
leafs.q: Question: Which of the following is a strong password?
leafs.button_error: Watch video on creating a password

leafs.name: Knowledge check 3
leafs.q: Question: Which of the following is not possible to do from the Parental Controls settings?
leafs.correct_option: Set time limits on when a specific program can be used

options.1: Set time limits on when a specific program can be used
options.2: Allow or block games with no rating
